posts.post_content: Why is she not getting 5 stars? She is a knight ([Knight Exemplar](/Pages/Card/Details.aspx?name=Knight Exemplar)), makes tokens ([Elspeth Tirel](/Pages/Card/Details.aspx?name=Elspeth Tirel)) a 3/4 body and has battlecry, what more do you need for a WW deck. She is a decent top deck with the exclution of [Sun Titan](/Pages/Card/Details.aspx?name=Sun Titan) and [Baneslayer](/Pages/Card/Details.aspx?name=Baneslayer). Plus she is a baby [Grave Titan](/Pages/Card/Details.aspx?name=Grave Titan)...

Posted By: ajpinton (1/31/2011 4:23:56 PM)
Rating:

posts.post_content:
I think the reason why she isn't wearing much isn't because of fanservice, but rather because the Auriok don't really wear that much--if you look at [Accorder Paladin](/Pages/Card/Details.aspx?name=Accorder Paladin), or the people on [Frantic Salvage](/Pages/Card/Details.aspx?name=Frantic Salvage) from the same set, they're not wearing full armor, or even shirts.   
  
As for her as a card, her abilities are quite good--when she attacks, just by herself she's basically attacking with seven points of damage. Now imagine her with [Honor of the Pure](/Pages/Card/Details.aspx?name=Honor of the Pure) of [True Conviction](/Pages/Card/Details.aspx?name=True Conviction) (or worse, both--that could kill a player if they, for some inexplicable reason, don't block). She's an amazing card with so much potential.
posts.html:
I think the reason why she isn't wearing much isn't because of fanservice, but rather because the Auriok don't really wear that much--if you look at Accorder Paladin, or the people on Frantic Salvage from the same set, they're not wearing full armor, or even shirts.

As for her as a card, her abilities are quite good--when she attacks, just by herself she's basically attacking with seven points of damage. Now imagine her with Honor of the Pure of True Conviction (or worse, both--that could kill a player if they, for some inexplicable reason, don't block). She's an amazing card with so much potential.

posts.post_content:
I was down to 3 lives and on my field I have a [Knight Exemplar](/Pages/Card/Details.aspx?name=Knight Exemplar), an [Accorder Paladin](/Pages/Card/Details.aspx?name=Accorder Paladin), a [Mirran Crusader](/Pages/Card/Details.aspx?name=Mirran Crusader), and a [White Knight](/Pages/Card/Details.aspx?name=White Knight). My opponent still has 20 lives and boasts 2 [Malakir Bloodwitch](/Pages/Card/Details.aspx?name=Malakir Bloodwitch), 1 [Vampire Nocturnus](/Pages/Card/Details.aspx?name=Vampire Nocturnus), and 1 [Gatekeeper of Malakir](/Pages/Card/Details.aspx?name=Gatekeeper of Malakir). I cast a [Day of Judgment](/Pages/Card/Details.aspx?name=Day of Judgment) removing all vampires and Knight Exemplar. Attack with all my Knights and my opponent uses [Fog](/Pages/Card/Details.aspx?name=Fog), I cast this card and my opponent has no creature/permanent removal in his hands. On his turn he played a land, returned 3 [Bloodghast](/Pages/Card/Details.aspx?name=Bloodghast) and cast another to the field, he attacked and I blocked 3 of his creatures. I was down to 1 life. On my next turn, I attacked with all of my creatures, lead by Accorder and this card and the result was:  
  
Hero of Bladehold = 4 damage  
2 tokens = 6 damage  
Accorder Paladin = 4 damage  
Mirran Crusader... [(see all)](javascript:void(0);)
posts.html:
I was down to 3 lives and on my field I have a Knight Exemplar, an Accorder Paladin, a Mirran Crusader, and a White Knight. My opponent still has 20 lives and boasts 2 Malakir Bloodwitch, 1 Vampire Nocturnus, and 1 Gatekeeper of Malakir. I cast a Day of Judgment removing all vampires and Knight Exemplar. Attack with all my Knights and my opponent uses Fog, I cast this card and my opponent has no creature/permanent removal in his hands. On his turn he played a land, returned 3 Bloodghast and cast another to the field, he attacked and I blocked 3 of his creatures. I was down to 1 life. On my next turn, I attacked with all of my creatures, lead by Accorder and this card and the result was:

Hero of Bladehold = 4 damage
2 tokens = 6 damage
Accorder Paladin = 4 damage
Mirran Crusader... (see all)

Posted By: CheeseTomato (2/19/2011 2:08:17 AM)

posts.post_content:
Solid card but I think it may be a little overrated due to the new factor right now. Dies to any 4/4 for 4 creature leaving a pair of 1/1s and there are lots of 4/4's for 4. 4 mana is actually pretty high in WW and 5 mana gets you a Baneslayer.  
  
Will definitely find a home in knight decks and possible R/W agro decks. Not a good fit for Quest and W/G actually has better options [Thrun, the last Troll](/Pages/Card/Details.aspx?name=Thrun, the last Troll), [Vengevine](/Pages/Card/Details.aspx?name=Vengevine).
posts.html:
Solid card but I think it may be a little overrated due to the new factor right now. Dies to any 4/4 for 4 creature leaving a pair of 1/1s and there are lots of 4/4's for 4. 4 mana is actually pretty high in WW and 5 mana gets you a Baneslayer.

Will definitely find a home in knight decks and possible R/W agro decks. Not a good fit for Quest and W/G actually has better options Thrun, the last Troll, Vengevine.

Come on guys, it's been a couple of weeks already without a comment like "Is that a blade you're holding or are you just happy to see me?" You guys are slackin'.
